alert.note: Alert for Chatanika River Valley; White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 29 at 2:20PM AKST until January 29 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility expected and very cold wind chills expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches by Monday Evening. Visibility one half mile or less at times. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. Very cold wind chills to 55 below. * WHERE...Dalton Highway Summits. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Areas of blowing snow will reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form. Wind chills to 55 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Chatanika River Valley; White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River
